30025000.Original_Text: 물건이 왜 안 오는 거야? \n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>배송업체</>에 연락해야겠어...
30025000.English_Text:
Why is the package taking so long to get here?
I'd better contact the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>shipping company</>...
30025000.Chinese_Text: 东西为什么还不来？看来需要联系一下送货公司...

30025001.Original_Text: 자, 자재도 왔으니 하나씩 고쳐 볼까?
30025001.English_Text: Now that the materials are here, let's start repairs.
30025001.Chinese_Text: 好，利用收到的资材一个个修理吧。

30025002.English_Text:
I'm really very busy.
Without me, the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Peach Blossom</> wouldn't even be able to operate.
30025002.Chinese_Text: 好忙，忙死了。没有我的桃花商廛根本无法正常运转。

30025003.Original_Text: 밑의 애들을 믿을 수가 없어. \n내가 다 확인해야 해.
30025003.English_Text:
I just can't trust the work of everyone under me.
I have to double check everything.
30025003.Chinese_Text: 我无法相信下面的人，必须亲手一一确认。

30025004.Original_Text: 또 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>어둑시니</>가 나왔다고?\n목탄을 못 구하면 어떻게 일을 해?
30025004.English_Text:
It's the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Oduksini</> again?
How are we supposed to work if we don't have charcoal?
30025004.Chinese_Text:
夜鬼又出现了？
没有木炭的话，该如何做事？

30025005.Original_Text: 이걸로 급한 불이라도 끄고...\n아니! 불을 끄지 말고 피워야지!
30025005.English_Text:
We should put out all urgent fires first...
No, wait! We should keep the fire, not put it out!
30025005.Chinese_Text:
先用这些材料救急...
什么！不要灭火，快生火！

30025006.English_Text: They said making a profit would be so easy here at <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Haewol</>...
30025006.Chinese_Text: 我明明听说只要来到海越大陆就能发大财...

30025007.English_Text: The most <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Haewol</>-like thing to do is to be creative!
30025007.Chinese_Text: 最具海月特色的就是最具创意的！

30025008.Original_Text: 아. 못 해 먹겠네. \n이제 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</>할배가 와도 같이 일 못해.
30025008.English_Text:
Drat, I can't do it.
I can't work, not even if the older <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seekers</> came here.
30025008.Chinese_Text: 唉，真是受不了。就算搜阳老爷子来也无法一起做事。

30025009.English_Text:
Come to think of it, I wasn't really acting mature, either...
I'll work on it and do better.
30025009.Chinese_Text: 仔细一想，我也不够成熟...需要反省。

30025010.English_Text: Clean water! Delicious food! Let's protect it, meow!
30025010.Chinese_Text: 干净的水！美味食物！都要守护喵！

30025011.English_Text: What do we do...? We're in big trouble.

30025012.English_Text:
We need to be careful.
The <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Mudlands</> are too dangerous.
30025012.Chinese_Text: 多加小心。黏土地带太危险了。

30025013.Original_Text: 위험해. 출입을 금지해야 할 것 같은데...
30025013.English_Text: It's too dangerous. We should make it off limits to people...
30025013.Chinese_Text: 很危险。看来需要禁止出入...

30025014.English_Text:
Don't you misunderstand us, hoo hoo!
We don't attack people, hoo hoo!
30025014.Chinese_Text: 不要误会奇奇！我们不会攻击人类奇奇！

30025016.English_Text: Hmm... How do we overcome this?

30025017.Original_Text: 재료가 없는데... 좀 쉬게 해주면 안 되나?
30025017.English_Text: We don't have any materials... Can't we rest a bit?
30025017.Chinese_Text: 已经没有材料了...可不可以让我休息一下？

30025018.English_Text: There's still a lot of things to do at <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Dojung Port</>.

30025019.Original_Text: 다 좋은데... 일단 밥부터 먹고 합시다.
30025019.English_Text: It's all good, but let's eat first.

30025021.Original_Text: 시설 관리라는 게 해도 해도 끝이 없어.
30025021.English_Text: Managing a facility is endless work.
30025021.Chinese_Text: 设施管理工作真是没完没了。

30025022.English_Text: Eating after finishing work is heaven.
30025022.Chinese_Text: 干活之后吃的饭最香了。

30025023.English_Text: Working, organizing documents, I'm so busy.
30025023.Chinese_Text: 干活啊，整理文件啊，真是忙得昏天暗地。

30025024.Original_Text: <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>예도항</> 말고 다른 곳으로 발령 내달라고 해야겠어
30025024.English_Text: I should ask them to send me to somewhere other than <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Dojung Port</>.
30025024.Chinese_Text: 我要申请去<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>誉导港</>以外的地方。

30025025.Original_Text: 입 열지 말고 묵묵히 일하자. \n아... 이 말도 하지 말걸...
30025025.English_Text:
Don't open your mouth and just get to work.
Ah... I shouldn't have even said that...
30025025.Chinese_Text:
少说话，多做事。
啊...这句话也不该说...

30025026.Original_Text: 내가 만든 장비들이 \n<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>해월대륙</> 전체에 쓰인다고 생각하니 기분이 좋네.
30025026.English_Text:
It feels good to think the gear I make
is used all over <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Haewol</>.
30025026.Chinese_Text:
一想到
整个<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>海越大陆</>都会使用我制作的装备就感觉心情愉快。

30025027.Original_Text: 속았어... 당한 거야. 내 전 재산...
30025027.English_Text: I've been tricked... I lost everything...
30025027.Chinese_Text: 上当了...受骗了。我的钱啊...

30025028.Original_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>사호</> 믿고 온 건데... \n이러면 안 되는 거 아닌가?
30025028.English_Text:
I came here because of my faith in the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Saho</>...
You can’t do this to me!
30025028.Chinese_Text:
我信任<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>四虎</>才会来到这里...
不该有这种结果吧？

30025029.English_Text: I’m never doing business with the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Peach Blossom</> again.
30025029.Chinese_Text: 我以后再也不会去<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>桃花商廛</>。

30025030.English_Text: We have to complain as a group.
30025030.Chinese_Text: 这是需要集体抗议的问题。

30025031.English_Text: I need to work hard... I have a family to feed!
30025031.Chinese_Text: 我要更加努力...才能养活家人！

30025032.Original_Text: 주변이 이렇게 위험한데... 어떻게 정착하고 살아?
30025032.English_Text: The surroundings are so dangerous. How do you expect me to settle here?
30025032.Chinese_Text: 周围环境如此危险...怎能安心定居？

30025033.English_Text: They told me that I could trust them and that <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Haewol</> is safe!
30025033.Chinese_Text: 不是让我相信<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>海越大陆</>很安全吗！

30025034.Original_Text: 내가 이런 취급 받으려고 여기까지 온 건가...
30025034.English_Text: I didn't come here to be treated like this...
30025034.Chinese_Text: 我来这里可不是为了受到这种待遇...

30025035.English_Text: It's probably because we don't have any power...
30025035.Chinese_Text: 这都是因为我们没有力量...

30025036.English_Text: It's all in the name of success.
30025036.Chinese_Text: 这都是为了我们大家好。

30025037.English_Text: Ah, who can help me deal with my frustrations?

30025039.Original_Text: 오늘따라 좀 피곤하네. 근무 언제 끝나냐...
30025039.English_Text: I feel tired today. When does my shift end?
30025039.Chinese_Text: 今天感觉有点累。什么时候才能下班呢...

30025040.English_Text: Will <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ko Gondae</> be on patrol today, too?
30025040.Chinese_Text: <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>古昆代</>大人今天也会来巡视吗？

30025041.Original_Text: 근무복이 너무 무거워. \n좀 가볍게 만들면 좋을 텐데...
30025041.English_Text:
My uniform is too heavy.
I wish they made it lighter...
30025041.Chinese_Text:
工作服太重了。
更轻一点该有多好...

30025042.English_Text:
We need a lot of <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>moss</>...
Would it be better to grow it, meow?
30025042.Chinese_Text:
我需要很多<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>苔藓</>喵...
是不是种植苔藓更好喵？

30025043.English_Text: There's lots of good herbs here, meow!
30025043.Chinese_Text: 这里有很多优质药草喵！

30025044.Original_Text: 너무 걱정하지 마. 잘 돌아올 거야.
30025044.English_Text: Don't worry too much, they'll come back safely.
30025044.Chinese_Text: 别太担心。一定会平安地回来。

30025045.Original_Text: 내일 되면 아무 일도 없었다는 식으로 돌아올걸?
30025045.English_Text: I bet they'll return tomorrow, so it should be no big deal.
30025045.Chinese_Text: 明天肯定会若无其事地回来。

30025046.Original_Text: 위험해. 출입을 금지해야 할 것 같은데...
30025046.English_Text: It's too dangerous. We should make it off limits to people...
30025046.Chinese_Text: 很危险。看来需要禁止出入…
